Delta Upsilon Alumni Association at Stanford University, Records

did.head: Overview

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Delta Upsilon Alumni Association at Stanford University.

did.unittitle: Delta Upsilon Alumni Association at Stanford University, records
did.abstract: Records consist of register of certificates of shares (containing stubs and canceled shares), 1897-1923; minute book also containing constitution and by-laws, 1897-1930; financial records, 1913-1930, including miscellaneous correspondence; official Articles of Incorporation from State of California, 1897; and three publications of the Fraternity, the DELTA UPSILON DECENNIAL CATALOGUE, 1903, THE MANUAL OF DELTA UPSILON, Seventh edition, 1937, and DELTA UPSILON BOOK OF SONGS, 1937.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

acqinfo.p: Gift of Sarah Mitchell Clark, 1997, and Stanford Alumni Association, 2001.

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Delta Upsilon Alumni Association at Stanford University, Records (SC0537). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: The Delta Upsilon Alumni Association at Stanford University was established in 1897.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Records consist of register of certificates of shares (containing stubs and canceled shares), 1897-1923; minute book also containing constitution and by-laws, 1897-1930; financial records, 1913-1930, including miscellaneous correspondence; official Articles of Incorporation from State of California, 1897; and three publications of the Fraternity, the DELTA UPSILON DECENNIAL CATALOGUE, 1903, THE MANUAL OF DELTA UPSILON, Seventh edition, 1937, and DELTA UPSILON BOOK OF SONGS, 1937.

controlaccess.head: Access Terms
controlaccess.corpname: Delta Upsilon Alumni Association at Stanford University.
controlaccess.subject: Greek letter societies.
